verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: The faces of U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: were] [ARGM-ADV: first and foremost] [ARG2: on North Korea 's official party newspaper] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-ADV: as state media hailed Tuesday 's historic summit between the two] men.</p >

< p > The faces of U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un were first and foremost on North Korea 's official party newspaper on Wednesday as [ARG0: state media] [V: hailed] [ARG1: Tuesday 's historic summit between the two] men.</p >
